about_the_game:
Bullet Hell Monday: Finale, Original Soundtrack.
Enjoy the music playing in the game.

*This product is the "Original Selection version." Some tracks from "Bullet Hell Monday: Finale OST" are also included in "Bullet Hell Monday: Black OST." This soundtrack only gathers the songs that are not included in "Bullet Hell Monday: Black OST." If you already own "Bullet Hell Monday: Black OST," purchasing this soundtrack will allow you to complete the entire collection without duplicate purchases.
